name: Adagio Vienna City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything you could possibly want in an apartment. Modern, clean, and city transportation just around the corner.
reviews.title: Beautiful, Spacious, Good Value

reviews.text: 4 nights in June, although it was pretty hot outside, the hotel was nice and comfy. Small but not too small studio apartment with fully equipped kitchen (and i mean fully - with wine caraffe and steak knives) really made our stay remarkable. Close to tram lines 1 and 2 and close to the airiport train. Even the beds were better than average hotel beds.
reviews.title: Clean, quiet, good location.

reviews.text: This is a great hotel, I would recommend to anyone whatever their business may be! Nice clean room, funky design, nice kitchen and bathroom. Free wifi and coffee in the lobby lounge area. I will definatly try the other locations!
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Comfortable and well located
Nice stay
reviews.text: Located well for light rail/tram routes that go everywhere, including a circuit of many of the main attractions. The hotel is comfortable, modern and quiet. Having an apartment room was handy and although we chose to eat out, the facilities in the room were very good for self catering. The bed was big and comfortable and the room was quiet. Staff were helpful and friendly. I would stay there again - which is always my self measure of the worth of a place!

This apart hotel is just great. Very spacious and clean rooms. Just in the center and in walking distance to evevrywhere. The staff was very helpful. Especially I would like to thank to Arun Sharma for his help.
reviews.title: Great apart hotel in the center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've travelled to Vienna for laisure and I must say that the Adagio Wien Zentrum hotel was totally over my expectations: great location, very clean, very nice people.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: It also included a fitness room and sauna that even if we didn't use was nice to have at our disposition.
reviews.title: My best experience of 2011, by far
very good value for long stayers
reviews.text: I was really very happy with my stay at the hotel Adagio.

First, it's an appart hotel, so be warned. It's well located, just at the border of the city centre, so it has all the advantages. In 10 minutes you are in the centre, or in a park neaby. The hotel is also located between two stations going to the airport, which is always convenient.
reviews.title: A good base for exploring Vienna.

reviews.text: Very nice location, close to ringstrasse stop, metro station, and a nice bakery, were we used to have breakfast, in front of the metro station. It's possible too to have breakfast at the hotel, but there's not so much option.
reviews.title: Praticity

reviews.text: The room is very nice, with a small kitchen, but the shower place isn't totaly close, so we split water all over when have a bath.
reviews.title: Perfect accomodation

reviews.text: The internet is not available in the rooms, only at the lobby.
reviews.title: Reviews = Expectation = Reality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's possible to have a sauna and do laundry inside the hotel.
reviews.title: very practical

reviews.text: Stayed in the Adagio with three friends for a weekend. The apartment is nicely furnished, very clean and includes everything needed for a comfortable stay. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Downtown Vienna is just 10-15 minutes away on foot with the next tram station being just outside of the hotel. There is also the possibility to rent a city bike on a station nearby, which is a very cheap and easy way to explore the city.
reviews.title: Super))

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is everything we asked for and more. From the airport we caught the CAT (City Airport train) 8 euros each way .The CAT station is just in front of the airport exit door and one level down.
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay
Great location and modern, comfortable rooms
reviews.text: It takes around 20- 25 minutes to reach the city centre and its a pleasant walk of around 15 mins to Adagio City Apart Hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front desk greeted us warmly and gave a brief on the available facilities in and around the hotel. We checked into the 6th floor room which had a great view (see pics) and all the amenities of a home.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, friendly staff

reviews.text: The sofa bed which you just need to pull down from the wall was very comfortable and spacious for two. The apartment has a free internet,iron with ironing board, a hair dryer and music system. The bath tub and shower are quite new and comfortable and has huge bottles(>250ml) of aromatic bath(hair and body)product and a hand wash. The apartment comes with a fridge, microwave, electric Kettle, dishwashwer, a fully euipped kitchen with crockery.
reviews.title: Tis deserves a 5 star rating. Its much more than an apart hotel

description: The Adagio City Vienna is located in the heart of Vienna, right next to Julius-Raab-Platz and in close proximity to the ring road and the historical city center. We offer 124 fully equipped rooms, from studios for 2 people to 2-room apartments for 4 people. Located in the "Stubenviertel", with its unique facades, narrow alleys and numerous courtyards, it is the ideal base for a business trip or a long, relaxing weekend.
